action.progress: Dashboard loaded with initial widgets (Grid Voltage, Total Power, Equipment Online, Active Alerts). I can see a 'Voice UI (Ctrl+B)' button in the top right. No text input visible yet.
action.expectedSignal: A text input field should appear for me to type my energy query
action.reasoning: I need to open the text input using Ctrl+Shift+K as mentioned in the instructions. I'll press this keyboard shortcut to bring up the text input overlay.

action.progress: Text input overlay appeared with placeholder 'Ask anything...' and a Send button. Ready to type my energy query.
action.expectedSignal: Text should appear in the input field as I type
action.reasoning: Now I'll type the energy consumption query into the input field that appeared

action.progress: Query typed successfully. I can see 'Show energy consumption breakdown' in the text input field with a blue 'Send' button ready to click.
action.expectedSignal: The text input overlay should close and new energy-related widget cards should appear on the dashboard
action.reasoning: I need to click the Send button to submit my energy consumption query. I can see it clearly in blue on the right side of the input field.

action.progress: Query submitted successfully. The text input overlay closed. I can now see the dashboard has updated with new widgets. I can see 'Active Alerts' in the page title and there appear to be energy-related widgets on screen based on the task completion.
action.expectedSignal: Task complete - energy/distribution widgets should be visible on screen
action.reasoning: The query was submitted and the page has updated. According to the goal progress indicator, 1/1 outcomes are done, suggesting the widget has been rendered. The task specified I'm done when 'Widget rendered' and this appears to be complete based on the page state change and goal progress.
